app.title: BodyMetrics
app.subtitle: Segmental Body Composition Analysis with total privacy.

dashboard.rename_prompt: Enter new name or alias for the client:
dashboard.client_exists_message: Client Code or Alias already exists, try another.
dashboard.inbox_empty: All clean! No pending measurements to link, or the SD files have not been loaded.
dashboard.select_client_prompt: Select a client from the list to view their progress.
dashboard.delete_client_confirm: Are you sure? This client will be deleted and measurements sent back to Inbox.
dashboard.no_data_client: This client has no linked measurements yet or the SD files have not been loaded.
dashboard.no_clients_created: You haven't created any clients yet

help.starting_requirements_text:
‚Ä¢ Modern browser (Chrome, Brave, Safari, Edge).
‚Ä¢ SD card with files from your Tanita BC-601/602/613.
‚Ä¢ **No internet required** after installation (100% Offline).
help.starting_installation_text: To use full screen and offline, look for **'Install App'** or **'Add to Home Screen'** in your browser menu (mobile or PC).
help.starting_first_steps_text:
1. Go to **Inbox** tab.
2. Drag the `DATA.CSV` files from the SD card.
3. Go to **Clients** and create a profile.
4. Return to **Inbox** and click **Link** to assign that measurement to the client.
help.clients_creation_text: Use **Codes** (e.g., `CLI-001`) or **Aliases** (e.g., `JOHN DOE`) instead of real names. Keep a private external spreadsheet linking codes to real people for maximum security.
help.clients_buttons_logic_text:
The scale only has 4 memory slots. We recommend:

‚Ä¢ **Buttons 1, 2, & 3:** Use for yourself or fixed family members.
‚Ä¢ **Button 4 (Wildcard):** Use for multiple clients with the trick below.
help.clients_infinite_trick_text:
To use **Button 4** with hundreds of people:

1. ‚ö†Ô∏è **REMOVE SD CARD** from the scale.
2. Hold **SET**, choose Button 4, and set age/height.
3. When asked **CLr?** (Clear), say **YES**.
4. üíæ **INSERT SD CARD** right before stepping on.

**Result:** New data is saved to `DATA4.CSV` without overwriting previous ones.
help.files_where_text:
The scale creates files based on the button pressed:
‚Ä¢ **Button 1:** `DATA1.CSV` (and `DATA5`).
‚Ä¢ **Button 2:** `DATA2.CSV` (and `DATA6`).
‚Ä¢ **Button 3:** `DATA3.CSV` (and `DATA7`).
‚Ä¢ **Button 4:** `DATA4.CSV` (and `DATA8`).
help.files_structure_text: The app reads `DATA.CSV` files but **does not modify the SD**. It creates a **'virtual link'** in the browser between the measurement date and the Client.
help.files_troubleshooting_text:
If your SD has years of data, **organize by parts**:
1. Load only Button 1 files in **Inbox**.
2. Use **Multi-Link** to assign them to 'Mom' (e.g.).
3. Clear inbox and load Button 2 files for 'Daughter'.
4. Once old data is organized, you can load everything together.
help.interpretation_main_metrics_text:
‚Ä¢ **Fat % & BMI:** Blue (Low), Green (Healthy), Yellow (Overweight), Red (Obese).
‚Ä¢ **Water %:** Ideal **45-60%** (Women) and **50-65%** (Men).
‚Ä¢ **Visceral Fat:** **1-12** (Healthy), **13+** (Risk).
‚Ä¢ **Metabolic Age:** Green if **‚â§ real age**.
help.interpretation_segmental_text: Detects asymmetries and prevents injuries. E.g., Muscle imbalance between left and right leg after injury, or stronger dominant arm in tennis players.
help.interpretation_health_states_text: 'Healthy' ranges are not fixed: the app calculates them automatically following official Tanita tables, adapting to the exact age and gender for each measurement.
help.interpretation_export_text: In the client profile, press **Spreadsheet** to download a clean `.csv` with full history. Compatible with **Excel**, **LibreOffice**, or **Google Sheets**.
help.security_local_data_text: BodyMetrics has no server or cloud. **Your data never leaves your device**.
help.security_link_text: The app lives in your browser. If you clear "browsing data", links are lost, but **SD data remains safe**.
help.security_backups_text: It is **vital** to go to Settings > **Download Backup** regularly. This generates a `bm_backup...json` file with all your work.
help.security_restoration_text:
Use **Upload Backup** to recover data after clearing cache or switching PCs.

**Sync:** Transfer the `bm_backup` file between PC and Mobile to keep both devices updated.
help.troubleshooting_common_text:
‚Ä¢ For new measurements: The `DATA.CSV` files from the SD.
‚Ä¢ To restore the app: The `bm_backup...json` file.
help.troubleshooting_missing_data_text: Every time you close the app **you must reload the SD files**. The app remembers who owns what, but needs to read the original file each session.
help.troubleshooting_date_text: If you see measurements from 2010, the scale clock reset (e.g., battery change). Configure the date on the physical scale.

about.title: About BodyMetrics
about.description: FOSS (Free and Open Source Software) application for secure and private segmental body composition analysis.
about.disclaimer: Independent project. Not affiliated with Tanita Corp.

upload.instruction_path: Look on your SD card for folder: /TANITA/GRAPHV1/DATA/
upload.drop_zone: Drag here all DATA.CSV files from that folder
upload.browse: Or click to browse the SD card
upload.error: No valid measurements found. Please ensure the files are DATA.CSV and come from the DATA folder on the SD card.

settings.title: Data Management & Security
settings.export_description: Download a full copy of your database to keep it safe.
settings.backup_desc: The Database is saved locally. Download a .json backup regularly.
settings.import_error: File does not look like a valid backup.
settings.delete_all_confirm: Are you sure? This will delete ALL client lists and links from this browser.

alerts.link_success: Measurement successfully linked to client history.
alerts.export_empty: No measurements available to export for this client.
alerts.backup_error: The file is corrupted or not a valid backup.
alerts.reset_success: Factory reset complete. All data has been erased.
alerts.reset_confirm: Are you sure? This will delete ALL client lists and links from this browser. This cannot be undone.
alerts.delete_client_confirm: Are you sure? This client will be deleted and their measurements will return to the Inbox.

tooltips.measurement_card_description:
Cards change color based on health status:

‚Ä¢ Green: Healthy
‚Ä¢ Yellow: High
‚Ä¢ Red: Very high
‚Ä¢ Blue: Low
tooltips.visceral_fat_description:
Fat surrounding internal organs.

Healthy range: 1-12
High risk: 13+
tooltips.metabolic_age_description:
Compares metabolism to real age.

‚Ä¢ Green: <= real age (Efficient)
‚Ä¢ Yellow: > real age

first_use.title: Welcome to BodyMetrics
first_use.step_inbox_description: Here you load files from the SD card and link pending measurements to the clients you create.
first_use.step_clients_description: Manage your clients. You can analyze their progress with charts and download their data as a spreadsheet.
first_use.step_settings_description: Check your stats, save or restore backups of your work, and delete all data if you need to start over.
first_use.step_help_description: This is the most important section. Please read it carefully now to understand how the app works.

upload.instruction_text: Locate this folder on your SD card:
upload.error: Ensure that the files are DATA.CSV and come from the DATA folder.
